Summary: Flickering light going in a straight line quite fast then the light dimmed and went out
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sutton-in-Ashfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just casually sitting looking out of my window and I noticed a bright flickering light in the sky. It was moving quite quickly in a straight line ascending a little for around 10 seconds and then the light started to dim. The light eventually went out and then I was no longer able to see it. It was as if it disappeared.
